name: Sweet Candy
description:
Sweet Candy is a casual game. Everything is done so that you just come in, relax, listen to music and look at beautiful girls. Go through simple levels and discover new girls in your gallery, and then you can sit and admire your collection of girls.
In this game you need to correctly match identical candies in a row so that they disappear (no matter in which direction), collect points, and unlock new levels. Try to play, maybe you will be addicted?

What can be found in "Sweet Candy":


  • Not difficult and passable levels
  • Very beautiful girls
  • Nice and relaxing music
  • With each level a new girl
  • Nice looking graphics
  • The opportunity to relax after a hard day
